code: @Test public void stopsMeterRegistryWhenContextIsClosed() {     this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(BaseConfiguration.class).run((context) -> {         HumioMeterRegistry registry = context.getBean(HumioMeterRegistry.class).         new JvmMemoryMetrics().bindTo(registry).         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isFalse().         context.close().         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isTrue().     }). }
@Bean public HumioMeterRegistry customRegistry(HumioConfig config, Clock clock) {     return new HumioMeterRegistry(config, clock). }
